caption.p: Identification of potential immune subtypes of PAAD. a Cumulative distribution function curve and ( b) delta area of immune-related genes in ICGC cohort. c Sample clustering heat map. d Kaplan-Meier curves showing OS of PAAD immune subtypes in ICGC cohort. ( e, f) Distribution of IS1-IS5 across PAAD (E) stages and ( f) grades in ICGC cohort. g Kaplan-Meier curves showing OS of PAAD immune subtypes in TCGA cohort. h, i Distribution ratio of IS1-IS5 across PAAD ( h) stages and ( i) grades in TCGA cohort
